Description:
On behalf of a multinational retailer, we are seeking a young Accountant. Based in Riyadh you will report to the Senior Accountant.To accurately maintain the organization’s financial records and transactions (invoices, AP, payroll) in accordance with established procedures and guidelines.
Maintain accounting controls by adhering to the accounting department’s policies and procedures.
Reconcile accounts, post journal entries, and maintain a complete and accurate general ledger in accordance with accounting principles and reporting schedules so that the organization has a full and accurate statement of its financial position.
Correct errors, if necessary, by posting adjusting journal entries.
Verify and process accounts payable accurately and within payment schedules, and prepare reconciliation checks; provide departments with payment status, when requested.
Assist with period-end closing transactions (monthly/quarterly/annually).
Perform other supporting duties as directed by the supervisor. 
Collect and compile simple financial information and assist senior accountants to prepare accurate and timely financial reports and accounting statements for senior management.
These reports may include profit and loss statements, balance sheets, depreciation statements, cash flow, payment schedules, regulatory reports, and filings.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in Accounting
1 to 2 years of experience in a similar role
Basic knowledge of accounting programs
Analytical Skills
Problem-Solving Skills
Communication Skills
Computer Literacy (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook)
Detail Orientated
Strong understanding of accounting aspects like balance sheets, cash flow management, business forecast, and profitability.
Strong communication skills.
Strong attention to detail and good analytical skills.
